thread.title: Embraer CEO sees "very good" talks with Boeing, gov't on tie-up

title: Embraer CEO sees "very good" talks with Boeing, gov't on tie-up
text: March 8, 2018 / 4:48 PM / in 12 minutes Embraer CEO sees "very good" talks with Boeing, gov't on tie-up Reuters Staff 1 Min Read SAO PAULO, March 8 (Reuters) - Embraer SA has seen “very good engagement” in ongoing talks with Boeing Co and the Brazilian government about a potential partnership between the planemakers, Chief Executive Paulo Cesar Silva told analysts on a Thursday conference call. Brazilian President Michel Temer is still weighing whether to support a proposal for the two companies to join forces on a commercial aviation venture, his spokesman said last week. The government holds a “golden share” in Embraer giving it veto power over such strategic decisions. Reporting by Brad Haynes Editing by Chizu Nomiyama
